00023 class wxStaticText;

00025 class WaveTrack;
00026 
00027 class EffectFindClipping:public Effect
00028 {
00029  friend class FindClippingDialog;
00030 
00031  public:
00032 
00033    EffectFindClipping();
00034 
00035    virtual wxString GetEffectName()
00036    {
00037       return wxString(_("Find Clipping..."));
00038    }
00039 
00040    virtual std::set<wxString> GetEffectCategories()
00041    {
00042       std::set<wxString> result;
00043       result.insert(wxT("http://lv2plug.in/ns/lv2core#AnalyserPlugin"));
00044       return result;
00045    }
00046 
00047    virtual wxString GetEffectIdentifier()
00048    {
00049       return wxString(wxT("FindClipping"));
00050    }
00051 
00052    virtual wxString GetEffectAction()
00053    {
00054       return wxString(_("Detecting clipping"));
00055    }
00056    
00057    virtual int GetEffectFlags() {
00058       return BUILTIN_EFFECT | ANALYZE_EFFECT;
00059    }
00060 
00061    virtual wxString GetEffectDescription(); 
00062 
00063    virtual bool PromptUser();
00064    virtual bool TransferParameters( Shuttle & shuttle );
00065    
00066    virtual bool Process();
00067 
00068  private:
00069    bool ProcessOne(LabelTrack *l, int count, WaveTrack * t,
00070                    sampleCount start, sampleCount len);
00071  
00072    int mStart;   
00073    int mStop;    
00074 };
